sense.def:
To fend for oneself
pomeni skrbeti zase, ne da bi se zanašali na pomoč drugih.

cit.quote: skrbeti zase, sam se prebijati, znajti se

seg.quote: Grown up children should leave home and fend for themselves.

sense.def:
To fend off someone
pomeni braniti se z rokami ali palico, navadno pred nekom, ki nas napada.

To fend off questions or requests
pomeni izogniti se odgovoru na vprašanja ali zahteve.

seg.quote: She fended off all these claims.
